Bindings.Binding: local function t(n) Bartender4.Bar.barregistry[n]:SetVisibilityOption("always",not Bartender4.Bar.barregistry[n]:GetVisibilityOption("always")) end t("1") t("3") t("4") t("5") t("6") t("PetBar")
